title: Adadada Arrambame Lyrics Arrambam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Adadada Arrambame
Singer: Shankar Mahadhevan
Music : Yuvan
Lyrics: Pa VIjay

Podu podu sound-u pattayathaan murikanuda
aadu aadu round-u sevilellaam pirikanuda
ye vanathuke vedivachi paarpomada
ye megamellaam melatha vaasikka
thaalaththa vaasikka aatatha aaramippom

Adadada aarambamey, ippo adhirudhadaa..
adadadaa aaagaayamey ippa alarudhada

Ye solli vachi adichaa,
kai pulli vachi pudichaa
nam orrukulla una suthi oilivattamey

Ye pandhayathil jeyichaa,
nee vallavan thothaa
yemaandhavaa ada poda un sattamey

Nee atthi poova vedhachaaley
thanni vittu nenachaaley
andha vidahi arali poo kodukaadhadaa

Adadada aarambamey, ippo adhirudhadaa..
adadadaa aaagaayamey ippa alarudhada

Ye nethirundha raaja
dhee raajanallaam inmai
ikaanavillai idhudhaandaa nijamaanadhu

Ye unna suthi poopoda
aalirukkum pugal paada
vaayirikkum ellaamey nizhalanadhu

Nam aasapattu vazhurandaa
edhukaaga ikanamdhaan ellaamey kondaatamey

Adadada aarambamey, ippo adhirudhadaa..
adadadaa aaagaayamey ippa alarudhada
